|flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/19/2016 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = N82E16833555072 |asin = B06X1CTFMT |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "10030661" and"V1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Additional specifications, per '''Tenda''''s product page, follow... {{•}} Dimensions (L x W x H): [[Dimensions::30 mm x 94 mm x 13 mm]] ==Links of Interest== *[http://lovetans.blog.163.com/blog/static/73633086201731054822/ ''Tenda U12 AC1300 USB 3.0 Adapter'' on '''Lovetans'''] (PCB V1.2 images) :5GHz FEM: ''[[Richwave]]'' [http://www.richwave.com.tw/prd_wifi_fem.html RTC5633] (marked 845, 5633, 5639) *[https://github.com/xxNull-lsk/rtl8812AU/commit/a88cb341d021b58397307a144b1af1d9941da5c0 ''Tenda U12'' - Linux driver] (rtl8812AU_linux_v5.1.5_19247.20160830) :{{•}} [[Tenda U12]] (V1.0) - [[Realtek]] RTL8812AU ([http://usb-ids.gowdy.us/read/UD/2604/0012 2604:0012])
